item.title: 9.14 beta
item.description:
Version 9.14 beta erschienen.

Changelog:

  • WIM support was improved.

zum Download

 

Informationen im Forum

 

Datum: 04. Juni 2010

item.title: 9.13 beta
item.description:
Version 9.13 beta erschienen.

Changelog:

  • 7-Zip now stores NTFS file timestamps to ZIP archives.
  • New additional "Open archive >" item in context menu allows to select archive type for some files.
  • Some bugs were fixed.
  • New localization: Uyghur.

zum Download

 

Informationen im Forum

 

Datum: 15. April 2010

item.title: 9.12 beta
item.description:
Version 9.12 beta erschienen.

Changelog:

  • ZIP / PPMd compression ratio was improved in Maximum and Ultra modes.
  • The BUG in 7-Zip 9.* beta was fixed: LZMA2 codec didn't work, if more than 10 threads were used (or more than 20 threads in some modes).

zum Download

 

Datum: 24. März 2010

item.title: 9.11 beta
item.description:
Version 9.11 beta erschienen.

Changelog:

  • 7-Zip now supports PPMd compression in ZIP archives.
  • Speed optimizations in PPMd codec.
  • The support for archives in installers was improved.
  • Some bugs were fixed.
  • New localization: Kazakh.

zum Download

 

Datum: 15. März 2010

item.title: 9.10 beta
item.description:
Version 9.10 beta erschienen.

Changelog:

  • The BUG in 7-Zip 9.09 beta was fixed: 7-Zip created incorrect ZIP archives, if ZipCrypto encryption was used.

zum Download

 

Datum: 22. Dezember 2009

item.title: 9.09 beta
item.description:
Version 9.09 beta erschienen.

Changelog:

  • 7-Zip now can unpack Apple Partition Map (APM) disk images.
  • Speed optimizations in AES code for Intel's 32nm CPUs.
  • Speed optimizations in CRC calculation code for Intel's Atom CPUs.
  • Some bugs were fixed.

zum Download

 

Datum: 12. Dezember 2009

item.title: 9.07 beta
item.description:
Version 9.07 beta erschienen.

Changelog:

  • It's possible to specify Diff program in options (7-Zip File Manager).
  • Some bugs were fixed.

zum Download

 

Datum: 27. August 2009

item.title: 9.06 beta
item.description:
Version 9.06 beta erschienen.

Changelog:

  • 7-Zip now can unpack MSLZ archives.
  • Partial parsing for EXE resources, SWF and FLV.
  • Some bugs were fixed.

zum Download

 

Datum: 17. August 2009

item.title: 9.04 beta
item.description:
Version 9.04 beta erschienen.

Changelog:

  • 7-Zip now can update solid .7z archives.
  • 7-Zip now supports LZMA2 compression method.
  • 7-Zip now supports XZ archives.
  • 7-Zip now can unpack NTFS, FAT, VHD and MBR archives.
  • 7-Zip now can unpack GZip, BZip2, LZMA, XZ and TAR archives from stdin.
  • 7-Zip now can open/copy/compress disk images (like \\.\c:) from \\.\ folder.
  • 7-Zip File Manager now doesn't use temp files to open nested archives stored without compression.
  • New -scrc switch to calculate total CRC-32 during extracting / testing.
  • New -scc{WIN|DOS|UTF-8} switch to specify charset for console input/output (default = DOS).
  • Some bugs were fixed.

zum Download

 

Datum: 30. Mai 2009

Version 4.65 erschienen.

Changelog:

  • 7-Zip File Manager now can calculate SHA-256 checksum.
  • Some bugs were fixed.

zum Download

 

Datum: 03. Februar 2009
